name: browser_automation_persistent
description: Enhanced persistent browser automation tool with session management. Sessions remain open between calls until explicitly closed. Supports Firefox and Chrome, article extraction, screenshots, form filling, element interaction, JavaScript execution, and much more.

session_id.description: Browser session ID. Defaults to 'default'. Sessions persist between calls.

session_command.description: Session management command: 'close' (close specific session), 'list' (list active sessions), 'close_all' (close all sessions)

url.description: The full URL of the page to navigate to (optional if using existing session)

headless.description: Run browser in headless mode. Default: true

implicit_wait.description: Implicit wait timeout in seconds. Default: 10

page_load_wait.description: Additional wait after page load in seconds. Default: 2

user_agent.description: Custom user agent string to use for requests

extract_article.description: Extract main article text. Default: false

take_screenshot.description: Capture a screenshot. Returns base64. Default: false

execute_js.description: JavaScript code to execute on the page

wait_for_element.description: CSS selector of element to wait for (10s timeout)

click_element.description: CSS selector of element to click

type_selector.description: CSS selector of element to type into (used with type_text)

type_text.description: Text to type into an element (requires type_selector)

set_cookies.description: Cookies to set before navigation: 'name1=value1; name2=value2'

save_path.description: Local file path to save extracted content (HTML or article text)
